gamerule.splatcraft:inkwellChangesInkCol: If inkwells change the ink colour of entities on top of one.
gamerule.splatcraft:universalInk.descrip: You can submerge in any ink colour, regardless of your ink colour.
config.splatcraft.color_lock.tooltip:
When enabled, ink colours are
replaced with just a friendly
or hostile colour.
Useful for colour-blind users.
command.splatcraft.argument.ink_color.ta: Tags aren't allowed here, only actual ink colours
command.splatcraft:inkcolor.single.succe: Changed the ink colour of %s to %s
command.splatcraft:inkcolor.multiple.suc: Changed the ink colour of %s inkables to %s
